portfolio.title: Book Store
portfolio.description: Developed a full-featured Book Store web application using the MERN stack, enabling seamless CRUD operations with a clean, user-friendly UI. Implemented responsive design and optimized performance for enhanced user experience.

portfolio.title: Order-IT
portfolio.description: Developed a full-featured Food Delivery application using the MERN stack, enabling users to browse restaurants, place orders, and track them in real-time. Integrated secure authentication, payment gateways, and responsive design, ensuring a seamless and user-friendly experience across all devices.

portfolio.title: TCET- Website
portfolio.description: Developed a responsive website for Thakur College of Engineering and Technology using HTML,CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, featuring dropdown menus, image carousels, and announcement marquees

portfolio.title: Spotify-Clone
portfolio.description: Developed a Spotify-inspired web application featuring user authentication, personalized playlists, and album displays using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

testimonial.description: Vikas brought fresh ideas and excelled in front-end development, creating a user-friendly interface. However, there were delays and challenges on the back-end. With more experience, they will handle complex projects more smoothly

Vikas showed great potential and a strong willingness to learn. While there were some challenges with complex back-end integrations, her dedication and quick problem-solving were commendable. With more experience, she will be a valuable asset
